sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Form, Button, Col } from 'react-bootstrap';

class newProject extends React.Component{

	constructor(props){
		super(props);
		this.state = {
			owner: "",
			projectName: "",
			goal: 0,
			maxInvest: 0,
			minInvest: 0,
			description: "",
			symbol: "",
			name: "",
			decimals: 0,
			startDate: 0,
			bounsEnd: 0,
			bounsTokenToWei: 1,
			bonusTokenToWei: 0,
			endDate: 0,
			tokenToWei:0,
		};

	}

	handleProjectInput(){
		return {
			verifyGoal(event){
				const value = event.target.value;

				if ( (/^\d+$/).test(value) ){
					this.setState({goal:value});
				} else {

				}
			}
		}
	}

	printContent(){
		console.log(this.state);
	}

	render () {
		return (
			<Form className="container mt40 mb40">

				<Form.Group controlId="formProjectName">
					<Form.Label>项目名称</Form.Label>
					<Form.Control placeholder="Project name" onChange={  (e)=>{ this.setState({ projectName:e.target.value } ); }  } />
				</Form.Group>

				<Form.Group controlId="formGoal">
					<Form.Label>众筹金额(eth)</Form.Label>
					<Form.Control placeholder="Goal" onChange={  (e)=>{ this.setState({ goal:e.target.value } ); }  }/>
				</Form.Group>

				<Form.Row>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formMaxInvest">
						<Form.Label>个人最大投资(eth)</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="MaxInvest" onChange={  (e)=>{ this.setState({ maxInvest:e.target.value } ); }  }/>
					</Form.Group>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formMinInvest">
						<Form.Label>个人最小投资(eth)</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="MinInvest" onChange={  (e)=>{ this.setState({ minInvest:e.target.value } ); }  }/>
					</Form.Group>
				</Form.Row>

				<Form.Row>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formSymbol">
						<Form.Label>众筹代币名称</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="Symbol" onChange={  (e)=>{ this.setState({ symbol:e.target.value } ); }  }/>
					</Form.Group>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formName">
						<Form.Label>众筹代币详细名称</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="name" onChange={  (e)=>{ this.setState({ name:e.target.value } ); }  }/>
					</Form.Group>
				</Form.Row>


				<Form.Row>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formStartDate">
						<Form.Label>1 token兑换wei</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="Token to wei" onChange={  (e)=>{ this.setState({ tokenToWei:e.target.value } ); }  }/>
						<Form.Text className="text-muted">1token需要多少wei(1eth=1,000,000,000,000,000,000wei)</Form.Text>
					</Form.Group>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formDecimal">
						<Form.Label>代币小数位</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="Decimal" onChange={  (e)=>{ this.setState({ decimals:e.target.value } ); }  }/>
						<Form.Text className="text-muted">默认为0(1token是否可以有小数点 单token是否可拆分)</Form.Text>
					</Form.Group>
				</Form.Row>

				<Form.Row>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formStartDate">
						<Form.Label>开始众筹日期</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="Start Date" />
						<Form.Text className="text-muted">不填写默认为当前时间</Form.Text>
					</Form.Group>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formEndDate">
						<Form.Label>结束众筹日期</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="End Date" onChange={  (e)=>{ this.setState({ endDate:e.target.value } ); }  }/>
						<Form.Text className="text-muted">众筹日期截止</Form.Text>
					</Form.Group>
				</Form.Row>


				<Form.Row>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formBounsEnd">
						<Form.Label>众筹奖励结束日期</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="BounsEnd" />
						<Form.Text className="text-muted">奖励结束日期 (可以用相同的钱买到更多的token 可以为0)</Form.Text>
					</Form.Group>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formbounsTokenToWei">
						<Form.Label>奖励时间token价值</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="Bouns Token to wei" onChange={  (e)=>{ this.setState({ bounsTokenToWei:e.target.value } ); }  }/>
						<Form.Text className="text-muted">1token在奖励时间内需要多少wei购买(1eth=1,000,000,000,000,000,000wei)</Form.Text>
					</Form.Group>
				</Form.Row>

				<Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlTextarea1">
					<Form.Label>项目描述</Form.Label>
					<Form.Control as="textarea" rows="5" onChange={  (e)=>{ this.setState({ description:e.target.value } ); }  }/>
				</Form.Group>

				<Button variant="primary" type="button" onClick={this.printContent.bind(this)}>
					Submit
				</Button>
			</Form>
		);
	}

};

export default newProject;
